name: Sleeping Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with closed eyes and ZZZ symbols indicating sleep.
tldr: Shows tiredness, going to sleep, or finding something boring.

contextMeanings.meaning: Going to sleep or being tired.
Implying something is boring or putting you to sleep.

platformNotes.note: Used for both tiredness and calling something boring.
Common bedtime emoji or expressing exhaustion.
Can imply content is boring in comments.

generationalNotes.note: Often used to call something boring or uninteresting.
Both literal tiredness and boring contexts.
Usually interprets as literally being tired.

warnings.title: Can imply boredom
warnings.description: Using this in response to content can imply it's boring.
